title: Porn
description: WARNING: THIS IS AN EXTREME HORROR NOVEL. There is gore. There is bad language. There are scenes of a sexual nature.PORN tells the tragic tale of Victoria Sheldon - a young lady who wanted nothing more than to become an actress. With times being hard Victoria finds herself in the world of Adult Movie Industry where she soon carves a name for herself. Soon the offers are flowing in, as is the money, as she becomes more and more popular amongst the producers but then she meets him...A man with an offer she can't refuse. A man who has other ideas about how pornographic films should be filmed. A man catering for a much, much darker audience.From the Dark Mind behind Sick B*stards, Tortured and Rotting Dead F*cks - PORN is a violent tale of sex and revenge. It is intended for a mature audience only.
author: Matt Shaw
